name: Raspberry Mineral Water
description: An 8-ounce serving of our refreshing H+ Sport raspberry mineral water fulfills a day's nutritional requirements for over 12 vitamins and minerals.
label: Natural rehydration. Everything you need. Nothing you don’t. An 8-ounce serving fulfills a day’s nutritional requirements for over 12 vitamins and minerals, as proven in independent laboratories tests. Made in the USA with USA-sourced ingredients. No minerals were harmed in the making of this product. Please be kind to the environment and recycle this bottle.
ingredient: Artesian mineral water, H+ Sport Multi-Vitamin Powder, natural fruit flavor.
contains: Artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives, sugar, salt, soy, dairy, gluten, or yeast.
